concept.title: Expression Completion in Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can use the expression language in any stage or pipeline property that represents a numeric or string value. Expression completion provides a list of expression elements that are valid for use at that location. Use Ctrl + Space Bar to invoke expression completion for help with writing an expression or condition.

conbody.p: pipelinesexpression completionexpressionsin propertiesWhen you invoke expression completion, a list of data types, constants, fields, and functions display that you can use in the location. The list includes pipeline constants when defined, and available fields when the pipeline is valid for data preview.
When an element does not display in the list, it is not a valid element at the specified location.
